description: Leptospirosis is considered one of the most widespread zoonoses worldwide and usually results from contact with the urine of infected animals. The disease is caused by spirochetes of the genus Leptospira. Leptospires belong to the order Spirochaetales, family Leptospiraceae, genus Leptospira.The genus Leptospira is classified serologically into two species, the pathogenic species Leptospira interrogans and the saprophytic species Leptospira biflexa.
name: Leptospira Antibodies and Antigens
